channel.title: Big Data on R recipes
channel.description: Recent content in Big Data on R recipes

item.title: Big data packages
item.description: When you create an R data package, it may happen that the data is too big to be hosted on CRAN that has a package size limit of 5 MB or even on Github that has a repository size limit of 1 GB and a file size limit of 100 MB. Here I show how to build such a package in a way that leaves the data on another server and then lets the user download the data when (s)he needs it for the first time.
